did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Austiefungen in der Nordsee bei Juist, Langeoog & Spiekeroog

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Manuscript notations charting oceanographic data on the North Sea. Entries made on printed navigation forms.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The manuscript is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Austiefungen in der Nordsee bei Juist, Langeoog & Spiekeroog, Crerar Ms 248, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Manuscript notations charting oceanographic data on the North Sea. Entries made on printed navigation forms. In German.
I. Austiefungen in der Nordsee bei Juist, Langeoog & Spiekeroog vom 15t-19t Juni 1861 -- II. Austiefungen in der Nordsee bei Juist und Borkum vom 15t-18t Juli 1861.
